item.title: Trump joined by dozens of CEOs during his Middle East trip
item.description: President Trump was joined by more than 30 top business leaders and CEOs at a lunch in Saudi Arabia during his high-stakes Middle East tour.

item.title: 'I like you too much': Trump and Saudi crown prince bask in their friendship
item.description: Attendees of the U.S.-Saudi Investment Forum included scores of the world's most powerful CEOs, among them Elon Musk, Jensen Huang and Larry Fink.
